Html:
Hi

I try uiaverify to found a custom control inside of a gridsplitter.

Application is written in wpf and the area is templated and has a style.

UIAVerify display the gridsplitter on this way:

 http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/8831/uiaverify.jpg

I try Snoop (http://blois.us/Snoop/)

 http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/4964/snoopo.jpg

in snoop the real structure will be shown.

why does the tools display different results for the same element?

Throndorin
